item.title: HHC24 - Frostbit Decryption
item.description:
Introduction Link to heading

Hardest challenge of HHC24! This was chllenge require series of multiple detective and attack techniques. Lot’s of folks loose thier sanity during this road ðŸ›£.

Notes Link to heading

  1. Start by finding a way to decrypt the TLS traffic in the PCAP. This should give you a value for a nonce. If that value contains 2f in it, rgenerate the artifacts and start over, as otherwise the whole thing will be a lot more complicated
